LanguageData.BiofuelRefinery.label: biofuel refinery
LanguageData.BiofuelRefinery.description: Refines biological matter like wood or plant matter into chemfuel.
LanguageData.Brewery.label: пивоварня
LanguageData.Brewery.description: A work station with all the equipment needed to mix wort for beer production. Wort must be fermented to finally become beer.
LanguageData.ButcherSpot.label: butcher spot
LanguageData.ButcherSpot.description: A place for butchering animals. Due to the lack of equipment, butchering here yields only 70% of the meat and leather of each creature.
LanguageData.CraftingSpot.label: місце для виготовлення
LanguageData.CraftingSpot.description: A place for crafting simple items like knives or bows. Production here is slow because of the lack of tools.
LanguageData.DeepDrill.label: deep drill
LanguageData.DeepDrill.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources. This drill will yield stone chunks if no resources are present. Can be repositioned freely.
LanguageData.DrugLab.label: наркотична лабораторія
LanguageData.DrugLab.description: A work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs.
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.label: electric crematorium
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.description: A huge stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with extremely high temperatures.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.label: електрична плавильня
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.description: Видобуває метал з шматків шлаку і інших сплавів металу. Споживає багато енергії.
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.label: електрична кузня
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.ElectricStove.label: електрична плита
LanguageData.ElectricStove.description: Електрична плита з прикріпленою стільницею для приготування їжі.
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.label: електричний стіл кравця
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.description: Верстак з швейною машиною для швидкого пошиття одягу. Може працювати без електрики на 50% від нормальної швидкості.
LanguageData.FabricationBench.label: fabrication bench
LanguageData.FabricationBench.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools for producing technological marvels from simpler materials.
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel.label: fermenting barrel
LanguageData.FermentingBarrel.description: A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.label: кузня
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.FueledStove.label: плита
LanguageData.FueledStove.description: A wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.label: стіл кравця
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.description: Верстат для пошиття одягу вручну. Працює на 50% від швидкості електричного столу кравця.
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.label: hi-tech research bench
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Allows more rapid research, and unlocks advanced research projects.
LanguageData.Hopper.label: hopper
LanguageData.Hopper.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: hydroponics basin
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: A machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.label: simple research bench
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.description: A simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.TableButcher.label: стіл м'ясника
LanguageData.TableButcher.description: Важкий стіл для оброблення туш мертвих тварин на шматки сирого м'яса.
LanguageData.TableMachining.label: верстак
LanguageData.TableMachining.description: A work station for assembling machinery like guns and ammunition, or breaking down dead mechanoids.
LanguageData.TableSculpting.label: art bench
LanguageData.TableSculpting.description: A workbench equipped for creating art.
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.label: стіл каменяра
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.description: A work table with saws and chisels for cutting stone chunks into usable blocks.
